direction: Directions to SolveIn each problem, out of the five figures marked (1), (2), (3), (4) and (5), four are similar in a certain manner. However, one figure is not like the other four. Choose the figure which is different from the rest.
question: Choose the figure which is different from the rest.(1)     (2)     (3)     (4)     (5)
answer_description: The pins, equal in number to the number of sides in the main figure are attached to the midpoint of a side of the main figure in case of figures (2), (3), (4) and (5). In fig. (1), these pins are attached to a vertex of the main figure.

direction: Directions to SolveIn each problem, out of the five figures marked (1), (2), (3), (4) and (5), four are similar in a certain manner. However, one figure is not like the other four. Choose the figure which is different from the rest.
question: Choose the figure which is different from the rest.(1)     (2)     (3)     (4)     (5)
answer_description: In all other figures, the two line segments are parallel to each other.

direction: Directions to SolveIn each problem, out of the five figures marked (1), (2), (3), (4) and (5), four are similar in a certain manner. However, one figure is not like the other four. Choose the figure which is different from the rest.
question: Choose the figure which is different from the rest.(1)     (2)     (3)     (4)     (5)
answer_description: In all other figures, the arrow and the V sign lie towards the black end of the main figure.

direction: Directions to SolveIn each problem, out of the five figures marked (1), (2), (3), (4) and (5), four are similar in a certain manner. However, one figure is not like the other four. Choose the figure which is different from the rest.
